<a id="class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension"></a>

# OpenXRRenderModelExtension

**Inherits:** [OpenXRExtensionWrapper](class_openxrextensionwrapper.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

This class implements the OpenXR Render Model Extension.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This class implements the OpenXR Render Model Extension, if enabled it will maintain a list of active render models and provides an interface to the render model data.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_is_active"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **is_active**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_is_active)

Returns ``true`` if OpenXR's render model extension is supported and enabled.

\ **Note:** This only returns a valid value after OpenXR has been initialized.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_create"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[RID](class_rid.md) **render_model_create**\ (\ render_model_id\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_create)

Creates a render model object within OpenXR using a render model id.

\ **Note:** This function is exposed for dependent OpenXR extensions that provide render model ids to be used with the render model extension.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_destroy"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **render_model_destroy**\ (\ render_model\: [RID](class_rid.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_destroy)

Destroys a render model object within OpenXR that was previously created with [render_model_create()](class_openxrrendermodelextension.md#class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_create).

\ **Note:** This function is exposed for dependent OpenXR extensions that provide render model ids to be used with the render model extension.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_all"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](class_array.md)\[[RID](class_rid.md)\] **render_model_get_all**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_all)

Returns an array of all currently active render models registered with this extension.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_animatable_node_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **render_model_get_animatable_node_count**\ (\ render_model\: [RID](class_rid.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_animatable_node_count)

Returns the number of animatable nodes this render model has.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_animatable_node_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](class_string.md) **render_model_get_animatable_node_name**\ (\ render_model\: [RID](class_rid.md), index\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_animatable_node_name)

Returns the name of the given animatable node.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_animatable_node_transform"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Transform3D](class_transform3d.md) **render_model_get_animatable_node_transform**\ (\ render_model\: [RID](class_rid.md), index\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_animatable_node_transform)

Returns the current local transform for an animatable node. This is updated every frame.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_confidence"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[TrackingConfidence](class_xrpose.md#enum_XRPose_TrackingConfidence) **render_model_get_confidence**\ (\ render_model\: [RID](class_rid.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_confidence)

Returns the tracking confidence of the tracking data for the render model.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_root_transform"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Transform3D](class_transform3d.md) **render_model_get_root_transform**\ (\ render_model\: [RID](class_rid.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_root_transform)

Returns the root transform of a render model. This is the tracked position relative to our [XROrigin3D](class_xrorigin3d.md) node.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_subaction_paths"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md) **render_model_get_subaction_paths**\ (\ render_model\: [RID](class_rid.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_subaction_paths)

Returns a list of active subaction paths for this `render_model`.

\ **Note:** If different devices are bound to your actions than available in suggested interaction bindings, this information shows paths related to the interaction bindings being mimicked by that device.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_top_level_path"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](class_string.md) **render_model_get_top_level_path**\ (\ render_model\: [RID](class_rid.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_get_top_level_path)

Returns the top level path associated with this `render_model`. If provided this identifies whether the render model is associated with the player's hands or other body part.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_is_animatable_node_visible"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **render_model_is_animatable_node_visible**\ (\ render_model\: [RID](class_rid.md), index\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_is_animatable_node_visible)

Returns ``true`` if this animatable node should be visible.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_new_scene_instance"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Node3D](class_node3d.md) **render_model_new_scene_instance**\ (\ render_model\: [RID](class_rid.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_OpenXRRenderModelExtension_method_render_model_new_scene_instance)

Returns an instance of a subscene that contains all [MeshInstance3D](class_meshinstance3d.md) nodes that allow you to visualize the render model.
